statements: DELETE FROM twitter_sentiment WHERE tweet_id = 456 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM twitter_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM twitter_users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND location IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM tweets WHERE id = 100 AND user_handle = 'john_doe';
DELETE FROM trade_opportunities WHERE action = 'sell' AND user_id = 50;
DELETE FROM trades WHERE trade_id = 101 AND symbol = 'AAPL';
DELETE FROM tweet_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND tweet_id IN (SELECT tweet_id FROM users WHERE follower_count > 1000);
